name: Sankofa
description:
Play as Kit, a small fennec fox on a journey to recover his past. Explore and discover what was lost.

Lead Character Artist: Stevie Cole
Lead Technical Artist: Emma Roseburgh
Lead Environment Artist: James Feakins
Executive Producer: Lee Devonald
Rigger: Victoria Newberry
Animators: Amelie Talarmain, Joanna Walters
Composers: F1NG3RS, Santa Kilmagik
Lighting Artists: Alex Howell, Adam Nield
Temple Texture and Shader Artist: Sam Buchanan
